summary: wargroove.com animated images have flashing white rectangles when scrolling with OMTP enabled

comments.text:
STR:
1. Load https://wargroove.com/blog/
2. Slowly scroll the page up and down
3. Watch the animated images, such as the "The Four Factions: Dog" section's image.

RESULT:
The animated images have some flashing white rectangles. If I disable OMTP (by setting "layers.omtp.enabled" pref to false) and restart Firefox, then the problem seems to go away.

I can reproduce this problem in Nightly 59, but not Beta 58 or Firefox 57. I tried bisecting the regression with mozregression, but the bug is somewhat intermittent so I was not able to pinpoint the regression pushlog.

I am running macOS 10.13.2 on a MacBook Pro. Here is my about:support info:
